title: Can you name a song with the word 'gone' in it? - Quora

response.answer_text: There must be so many, but here are some that I love. :) “Get Gone,” Fiona Apple “All my Happiness is Gone,” Purple Mountains “Long Gone,” Phum Viphurit “The Thrill is Gone,” B.B. King “If you’re gone,” Matchbox Twenty “Got til it’s gone,” Janet Jackson “After the Love has Gone,” Earth, Wind, & Fire “Good Thing Gone,” Elle King “Gone Too Soon,” Michael Jackson “He’s Gone,” Grateful Dead “Everyone's Gone To The Moon,” Jonathan King “Where Have All the Flowers Gone?” Pete Seeger “Ten Years Gone,” Led Zeppelin “Lights Out, Words Gone,” Bombay Bicycle Club “Gone Daddy Gone,” Violent Femmes “Long Time Gone,” Crosb Continue Reading
